info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Singing Machine
collection.openText: “But nothing could compare to the music it makes when it eats a human.”

observe.desc: [ { 1. Attempts to bring other employees to the Containment Unit of ‘Singing Machine’ by physical force. 2. Dilated pupils. 3. Greatly reduced concentration and cognitive abilities. 4. Refusal to listen to other forms of music. Please list any additional symptoms that are found and immediately report any employees that are suspected of the noted symptoms. } ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: An employee with Level 4 or higher Fortitude dove into $0 after completing their work.
An employee with Level 2 or lower Temperance dove into $0 after completing their work.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the Qliphoth Counter reached 0, the next employee to enter the unit dove into $0 and activated it.
When $0 was in operation, a nearby employee complained that they could hear a continuous melody out of nowhere. We have decided to call this phenomenon “Addicted”.
#1 lost consciousness due to an attack by #0. After their attack, #0 dragged #1 to $0’s Containment Unit to be consumed in making music.
